WorkItem.Description: An offline mode for Rawr would be of much help for me.  I think of a small checkbox to disable all communication between Rawr and Armory.

Comments.Message: What would 'offline mode' do? What armory communications are you expecting to be optional?

I'd envision an offline mode to simply be a short-circuit for operations which require connectivity. For example, if "Work Offline" is enabled, actions such as: 
"Load from Armory...", 
"Reload Current Character from Armory", 
"Load Possible Upgrades From Armory" (why is From capitalized here and not in the previous option?), 
"Update Item Cache", 
"Open in Wowhead", and 
"Refresh Item Data" 
would either be disabled outright or show a simple error message stating "This feature is not available while working offline." before they even attempt to connect.
If you can choose an 'offline mode', why can't you not choose those menu options?
I want to use Rawr in an area where a connection attempt to all game-related sites is prohibited and logged. I don't want do be in the logs ;)
I'll see what I can do... Until then, just disable your internet connection?
